arts.ttl: Everton v West Ham United – Preview and predictions
arts.sum: West Ham’s trip to the Hill-Dickinson stadium has suddenly become something to anticipate instead of another dour Potterfest. New manager Nuno Espírito Santo has scarcely had a chance to see his West Ham squad training but, to his credit, decided to get to work with the squad straight away rather than await the international break. arts.ttl: West Ham United XI vs Everton – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: A new era begins for West Ham United on Monday night as Nuno Espírito Santo takes charge of his first match away at Everton. The Portuguese manager was appointed on Saturday morning following the dramatic sacking of Graham Potter, with the club sitting 19th in the Premier League table. arts.ttl: Everton vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Everton welcome West Ham to their new Hill Dickinson Stadium fortress on Monday, aiming to bounce back from a disappointing week.
